name: Escaping Summer
description:
This is Frank the Penguin:

One morning Frank woke up to find himself in the middle of a tiny tropic island

It's your job to help Frank fight the evil crab monsters and get back home!

This game was made for the Firith Summer Jam. It was made in under 48 hours!               Music By Adhesive Wombat: https://soundcloud.com/adhesivewombat/

Thanks for playing!
